overview: First film (of around thirty until this day) with électro-acoustic music. Dreamlike edition of male physical actions, executed according to synopsis established in common by four ‘actants’. Shot in outside, without story or words. The domain of the homosexual desire and pleasure is put in images of nature where materials become the ‘environment’. Films can be thrown only in the presence of the author, consult us on the conditions.
title: Cortège
